attributes.action: Stop Buy to Let Mortgages on properties deemed to be starter homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are forever hearing that people can't get on the property ladder because there are insufficient houses at the bottom of the chain. These houses are being snapped up buy Landlords as they are also very easy to rent out. By preventing landlords snapping up all the affordable properties there will be availability at the most important step on the housing ladder. By all means allow buy to let on mid to top range properties but let's stop preventing people from making a start.
